name: Limited Reserve Robusto
additionalNotes: This Long Filler Cigar owes its mellow taste to the exquisite blend of 5 year old Tobaccos, aged under the watchful eye of our President/Master Blender Antonio Urcuyo. Our Limited Reserve features a blend of Cuban seed, Corojo Viso, Olor Dominicano Ligero and Silvio Perez Nicaraguan Seco long fillers. All the Tobaccos in this blend are natural Sun Grown. The binder is of Costa Rican origin. The distinctive wrapper is Golden Habana 2000 natural Sun Grown.
